block.p: Hostage Episode at Kennedy A man with a gun entered the cockpit of a National Airlines jet and took the pilot and co-pilot hostage, the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey said. The passengers, and later the pilots, were released. PAGE B1

Potent New Greenhouse Gas Scientists have found rising concentrations of a newly identified gas that traps heat more effectively than other greenhouse gases, compounds that may be warming the global climate. PAGE A17
House Passes Tax-Cut Bill The House passed a bill cutting taxes on some Social Security benefits. A veto is probable, but Republicans see the vote as a political victory. PAGE A18
Bronx Census Fraud Alleged Census workers said supervisors pressured them to cut corners and to submit incomplete and fraudulent information so that unrealistic deadlines could be met. PAGE B1
